from secret import flag
from Crypto.Util.number import *
m = bytes_to_long(flag)
p = getPrime(512)
q = getPrime(512)
n = p*q
c = pow(m, 65537, n)
N = getPrime(1024)
leak = (pow(9999, 66666)*p + pow(66666, 9999)*q) % N
print(f'n={n}')
print(f'c={c}')
print(f'N={N}')
print(f'leak={leak}')
